document.masterDocTitle: Four new eriophyoid mite species in the tribe Anthocoptini (Acari: Eriophyidae: Phyllocoptinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Four new eriophyoid mite species in the tribe Anthocoptini (Acari: Eriophyidae: Phyllocoptinae) from China

heading.emphasis:
Key to the species of
Abacarus Keifer
from China

paragraph.keyLead:
- Paraxial tibial seta ( l' ) absent
............................................................. Abacarus emarginatus
Huang, 2001 c

- Prodorsal shield smooth
.......................................................... Abacarus tomentosus
Huang & Wang, 2004

8 Frontal lobe broad and round, annuli subequal dorsoventrally
...... Abacarus yunensis
Lin & Kuang, 2001

9 Empodium 4 -rayed, accessory setae (
h 1
) absent
........................ Abacarus diospyris
Kuang & Hong, 1989

- Empodium 6 -rayed, accessory setae (
h 1
) present
.................................. Abacarus floridulus
Huang, 2001 b

- Accessory setae (
h 1
) absent
..................................................... Abacarus zuihoensus
Huang & Wang, 2004

- Prodorsal shield densely covered granules
................................ Abacarus panici
Chen, Wei and Qin, 2004

- Dorsal annuli with microtubercles
..................................................... Abacarus similisagitta
Huang, 2001 c

14 Coxal plates with granules, prodorsal shield not anteriorly emarginated
Abacarus ellipticae
Huang, 2001
a

- Coxal plates with short lines, prodorsal shield anteriorly emarginated ........
Abacarus jiuhuaensis
sp. nov.

- Ventral annuli smooth
............................................................ Abacarus adinandrae
Wei, Li & Chen, 2004

- Middorsal opisthosomal ridge without a central crease
............................ Abacarus eminens
Huang, 2001 c

21 Median and admedian lines separate
......................................... Abacarus arunis
Chen,Wei and Qin, 2004

- Median and admedian lines connected
...................................... Abacarus wuyiensis
Kuang & Zhuo, 1987
23 Coxal plates with short lines, middorsal opisthosomal ridge without projecting lobes ............................ 24

- Prodorsal shield without granules
.......................................... Abacarus phyllostachyis
Lin & Kuang, 2001

- Prodorsal shield lobe with small projections anteriorly
............ Abacarus oplismeni
Kuang & Gong, 1996

26 Female
genital coverflap with two cross lines at base, empodium 6 -rayed
........ Abacarus fopingi
sp. nov.

- Female genital coverflap smooth at base, empodium 7 to 8 -rayed
........... Abacarus phalaris
Kuang, 1997
